price: 24. Al-lah los guio (en esta vida) hacia las buenas palabras (no hayninguna divinidad verdadera que merezca ser adorada excepto Al-lah) y hacia el camino de Quien merece toda alabanza (Al-lah).
arabic: وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيِّبِ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wahudū ilā al-ṭayibi mina al-qawli wahudū ilā ṣirāṭi al-ḥamīdi
